text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I got a perfect rest~. I even executed my original
sleep strategy, called——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
'The Strategy of Sleeping Right After Warming Up in the Bath'!
It was super effective!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Mufufu, I've written down all the details of the strategy
in my notes!
I'll tell you about it later, Trainer!

Anyway, it seems you got a good
rest!
